note: # Column with counts to be displayed as treemap elements
# colour pallete, if colour file not provided
# variable to be represented in the colour scheme
# extra data to be shown while hovering the mouse
# Title to be displayed at the top of the treemap

value: code:PER, code:BRA, code:PAN, code:USA, code:CHL, code:BOL
note: # comma-separated list of rows to keep or remove rows. Format: '~column_name:value'. Remove '~' to keep only that data category.
